menuHelpMd:
# Help

This is the help section. Here you can find information about how to play the game and get assistance if needed.

## How to Play

1. Join the game using the provided link or QR code.
2. Follow the instructions on your screen.
3. Interact with other players as required by the game.

## Getting Assistance

If you encounter any issues, please contact the host or refer to the FAQ section on our website.
